file_content.text: I can't believe we're still alive!
Don't act so surprised.
You shouldn't doubt me.
We're safe.
Oh my stars, thank you! You're amazing! I've never seen anything like that!
Don't get all excited about surviving.
For the moment.
Why would you say that? I never thought I'd get out of this mess alive!
I'm bailing out of here before more droids show up. Running away never felt so good!
My contract with Pirrell stipulates no loose ends. That means you.
I'm supposed to kill you.
I wasn't sent here to rescue you, Zalia.
Not how it's supposed to work.
You were dead the second I walked in here.
Not a chance, girl.
Oh... oh, no! Please don't kill me!
I swear I'll go straight! I'll never slice another computer! Just let me go!
No deal. [Kill her]
You're asking me to break my deal with Pirrell.
A contract is a contract.
I have a family to take care of--parents who depend on me! I'm begging you!
Pirrell's an idiot, anyway. He'd never know if you let her go.
I don't want to die. Please!
You have to promise to disappear.
Run and hide, then.
Absolutely! I'll change my name! Delete all records of my existence! It'll be like I was never born!
I believe her. Besides, Pirrell's an idiot. He'll never know.
Let me live. Please, let me live.
I never want to see you again, got it?
All right--disappear.
You won't! Thank you!
I like things done clean. Make the loose end worth it to me.
Buy your freedom.
Pirrell paid me in advance. I stashed the credits--let me go, and I'll tell you where!
The credits are in a lockbox. Here's the location and the code to open the box. They're all yours.
Should've never quit my job at the cantina....
I really hate it when they beg.
Not a chance. [Kill her]
I can't believe you just did that!
I was fulfilling my contract, that's all.
A job's a job.
It's possible to be a professional bounty hunter without being vicious like Tarro Blood.
I've got a job to do.
If you're done?
Yeah, sure. Let's just go.
Pretty low blow, don't you think?
That hurt.
I'm sorry, I didn't--I don't know what I'm saying. Just forget it.
You don't know what vicious is... yet.
Don't test me.
Never said I wanted to. Let's just go.
This is the Great Hunt, Mako. We have to kill to win.
Get real.
Sure--and some people deserve it. Let's just make sure we always know who they are.
The right people to kill are the ones we agreed to kill.
That depends on the job.
Yeah, I guess... I don't know. Let's go.
I'll exercise more restraint in the future.
You're right.
That's all I ask. Thank you.
I know who needs killing, girl.
Don't tell me my job.
Don't ever question my methods again.
Shut your mouth.
Whatever you say....
Wait! Aah!
No time to talk! Keep us alive!
You're Zalia the slicer, right? Pirrell sent me.
Oh, thank the stars! Don't know how much longer I could've held out!
My reconnaissance team was evaluating the factory's computer systems when the droids overpowered us.
The droids slaughtered my team. I've been stuck here for days without food, water or sleep!
I'm here to make sure you input the virus.
Finish your mission.
You know about that? But I can't do what Pirrell wants. It's impossible!
I know why you're really here, Zalia.
Pirrell told me everything.
You know about my mission? Then you should also know why I can't complete it. I already told Pirrell!
Pirrell told me you have a job to do.
So why aren't you working?
You know about my real mission? There's no way I can do what Pirrell wants. I told him that!
If I put the virus in the computer's control program, it'll trigger alarms! Those droids will swarm us!
A few droids aren't gonna hurt me.
I'm not worried.
No offense, but I'm not worried about you. Do I look blaster-proof?
I'll make a nice big scrap-pile out of 'em.
Not if I blast them first.
There are dozens of them out there. Crazy killing machines. You can't fight them all!
This isn't a debate.
Please listen! Inputting the virus is suicide! We won't last five seconds!
We've gotten out of way worse situations. We'll be fine!
You're totally set on this, aren't you. Okay...
Here goes nothing....
Can't believe you came in here willingly. This place is a death trap!
